context: Aerospace defense contractor evaluating investment in unmanned aerial systems (UAS) safety certification program to expand into commercial drone market

request.purpose: Develop and certify autonomous drone systems for commercial applications
request.justification: Commercial drone market projected to reach $45B by 2030, leveraging existing military UAS technology

decision_process.outcome: Identified strong market opportunity in industrial inspection and delivery sectors
Achieved FAA certification for BVLOS operations

business_impact.expected_outcome: Enter commercial UAS market with certified products, capture 5% market share within 3 years
business_impact.projected_value: $50,000,000 in new revenue streams over 5 years

lessons_learned: Military technology transfer requires significant adaptation for commercial certification requirements
